characters.name: Rory Mercury
alt_names: ロゥリィ・マーキュリー
characters.description:
A demigoddess and an apostle of Emroy, the god of darkness, war, violence and death. She is widely known as Rory the Reaper due to her wielding of her halberd as a scythe, slaughtering those who offend Emroy, and those she views are worthy of being punished by death.

Her gothic lolita dress is an outfit for priestesses. In terms of age, she is the third-youngest Apostle of the Twelve Apostles.

(Source: Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There! Wiki)

characters.name: Lelei la Lelena
alt_names: レレイ・ラ・レレーナ
characters.description:
Lelei is generally an emotionless girl, with her face constantly fixed in an expressionless look. She is usually calm and silent amongst her friends and would always speak in a collected way. She rarely raises her voice, even in dire situations.

However, there are cases where she displays her emotions, such as surprise and awe when she was saved by the JSDF when she was nearly stomped by a horse.

She is a student of Grand Master Cato El Altestan, having moved in with him to the outskirts of Coda village when she was nearly 10 years old.

characters.name: Tuka Luna Marceau
alt_names: テュカ・ルナ・マルソー
characters.description:
This beautiful elf girl is the only survivor from her village, which was destroyed by the dragon. She was very dedicated to her father, who died protecting her. Saved by Japanese soldiers, Tuka Luna lives among the refugees in their military camp.

~!Unable to cope with the loss of her father, she first acts as though he is staying at the base, insisting on two rooms and extra portions of meals. Her mental stability deteriorates over time and eventually, she latches onto Itami, calling him "father." In an effort to bring her to her senses, Itami brings Tuka along on the hunt for the Flame Dragon and forces her to aid in its defeat. Having avenged her father, she recovers — but refuses to stop calling Itami "father," claiming it had become a habit.

(Source: Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There! Wiki)!~

characters.name: Piña Co Lada
characters.description:
The daughter of the Emperor Molt Sol Augustus and his concubine, Countess Nell. She has two brothers, Zorzal El Caesar and Diabo El Caesar both of whom were candidates for the next Emperor. She is also the leader of Rose-Order of Knights.

~!Later she becomes a mediator between Japan and her empire, and gets strongly influenced by the otaku culture.!~

characters.name: Youji Itami
characters.description:
Itami is an otaku who loves to read doujinshi and online novels. Work is nothing more then something that provides an income source for his interest. Itami is a selfless person, he will help anyone who need help no matter if it's friend or enemy. He also cares about other people who he hasn't met before as seen when he immediately saved a japanese woman who was Zorzal's slave. Itami doesn't like the idea of slavery in Special Region. He can become friends with almost anyone no matter what their race is, and he doesn't seem to be bothered by that. Unlike other people in Special Region. He is desctibed as a bland man, but there is something captivating about him as stated by Rory. Itami gets along quite well with his ex-wife Risa, despite her occasionally begging him for money.

(Source: Gate Wiki)

characters.name: Shino Kuribayashi
characters.description: A female soldier and member of the Third Recon Team. She is a veteran and has a badge for hand-to-hand combat.

characters.name: Yao Ha Ducy
alt_names: ヤオ・ハー・デュッシ
characters.description: A dark elf who is over 300 years old. She seeks the JSDF's aid when the same dragon that attacked Tuka's village moves to the forest where her tribe lives, becoming a threat to them. After the dragon is vanquished, she joins Itami's party as well.

characters.name: Molt Augustus
alt_names: モルト・ソル・アウグスタス
characters.description: Emperor of the land beyond the Gate.

characters.name: Takeo Kurata
characters.description: Sergeant 3rd Class in Itami Youji's Third Reconnaissance Platoon. An extreme otaku like Itami, and often happily discusses otaku topics with his superior. Has a fetish for cat ears.

characters.name: Mari Kurokawa
characters.description: Sergeant First Class of Japan Self-Defense Forces and one of the female members of Itami's Third Recon Team. She also serves as the team's medic, and usually speaks in a calm and reserved manner, but has shown to be sharp tongued when she thinks the situation warrants it.

characters.name: Akira Yanagida
characters.description: The 1st lieutenant in the JSDF and one of Youji Itami's acquaintances.

characters.name: Hamilton Uno Ror
alt_names: ハミルトン・ウノ・ロー
characters.description: Member of the Rose-Order of Knights and Page of Piña Co Lada.

characters.name: Bozes Ko Palesti
alt_names: ボーゼス・コ・パレスティー

characters.name: Risa Aoi
characters.description: A poor doujin artist, who was [Itami](https://anilist.co/character/89065/Itami-Youji)'s high school junior. They were married for a few years, but have had a better relationship since getting divorced.

characters.name: Aurea
characters.description: Aurea is a maid who works for Formal Clan. During the Imperial Civil War, she works as a counter-spy for the loyalist and JSDF as well as the spy executioner.
